title: 服务器玩家领不了地皮

txt_content:

replies.author: 网络摆渡客
replies.txt_content:
往往往往 发表于 2015-1-10 23:30
怎么查用户组名字啊.....
看样子你没有改过...
用户组是：builder

replies.author: Smaoll
replies.txt_content:
给玩家加入以下权限
plotme.limit.1
plotme.use
plotme.use.add
plotme.use.remove

望采纳

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: Smaoll
replies.txt_content:
往往往往 发表于 2015-1-10 23:01
怎么加啊........
/mangaddp default 权限

添加完后重启

replies.author: 网络摆渡客
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp 用户组名 plotme.use
/mangaddp 用户组名 plotme.use.add
/mangaddp 用户组名 plotme.use.remove
